Package camzup.core

Class Sdf

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Sdf
public abstract class Sdf
extends java.lang.Object
Facilitates implicit shapes created with signed distance fields. Adapted from the GLSL of Inigo Quilez: 2D Distance Functions, Distance Functions.
Author:
Inigo Quilez

  • Method Details

    • arc

      public static float arc​(Vec2 point, float startAngle, float stopAngle, float bounds, float weight)
      A wrapper function around the default signed distance for arc. Follows the Processing convention of specifying the start and stop angle as inputs. This calls cosine twice and sine twice, and so will slow performance.
      Parameters:
      point - the point
      startAngle - the start angle
      stopAngle - the stop angle
      bounds - the bounds
      weight - the stroke weight
      Returns:
      the signed distance
      See Also:
      Utils.mod1(float), Utils.scNorm(float), arc(Vec2, float, float, float, float, float, float)

    • box

      public static float box​(Vec2 point, Vec2 bounds)
      Draws a two dimensional box whose dimensions are described by the bounds.
      Parameters:
      point - the point
      bounds - the bounds
      Returns:
      the signed distance
      See Also:
      Utils.hypot(float, float), Utils.min(float, float), Utils.max(float, float)

    • box

      public static float box​(Vec2 point, Vec2 bounds, float rounding)
      Draws a two dimensional box with rounded corners whose dimensions are described by the bounds.
      Parameters:
      point - the point
      bounds - the bounds
      rounding - corner rounding factor
      Returns:
      the signed distance
      See Also:
      box(Vec2, Vec2)

    • line

      public static float line​(Vec2 point, Vec2 origin, Vec2 dest)
      Draws a line from the origin to the destination, where the distance field is characterized by a third point's distance from the line.
      Parameters:

      origin - the origin
      dest - the destination
      Returns:

      See Also:

    • polygon

      public static float polygon​(Vec2 point, int vertices, float angle, float bounds)
      Draws a regular polygon given a count of vertices. The number of vertices should be greater than three.
      Parameters:
      point - the point
      vertices - number of vertices
      angle - angular offset
      bounds - the bounds
      Returns:
      the signed distance

    • polygon

      public static float polygon​(Vec2 point, Vec2[] vertices)
      Draws a polygon from a series of vertices. The number of vertices is assumed to be greater than three. With reference to https://www.shadertoy.com/view/wdBXRW .
      Parameters:
      point - the point
      vertices - the vertices
      Returns:
      the signed distance
      See Also:
      Utils.clamp01(float), Utils.div(float, float), Utils.min(float, float), Math.sqrt(double)

    • polygon

      public static float polygon​(Vec2 point, Vec2[] vertices, float rounding)
      Draws a rounded polygon from an array of vertices, assumed to be greater than two.
      Parameters:
      point - the point
      vertices - the vertices
      rounding - corner rounding
      Returns:
      the signed distance
      See Also:
      polygon(Vec2, Vec2[])
